tool_description:
An API for interesting facts about numbers. Provides trivia, math, date, and year facts about numbers. 

For example, "5 is the number of platonic solids", "42 is the number of little squares forming the left side trail of Microsoft's Windows 98 logo", "February 27th is the day in 1964 that the government of Italy asks for help to keep the Leaning Tower of Pisa from toppling over"
name: Numbers
title: Numbers

api_list.name: Get date fact
api_list.description: Get a fact about a day of year

parameters.name: fragment
parameters.description: Add "?fragment=true" to return the fact as a sentence fragment that can be easily included as part of a larger sentence. This means that the first word is lowercase and ending punctuation is omitted. For trivia and math, a noun phrase is returned that can be used in a sentence like “We now have more users than [fact as fragment]!”.

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: Specify "true" to return result as JSON instead of plaintext.

utterances.utterance: What is an interesting fact about June 21st?
Tell me a trivia fact about December 25th.
Can you provide a math fact about March 14th?
Give me a historical fact about July 4th.
What happened on January 1st?
Find a fact about February 29th.
Tell me something interesting about August 15th.
What is a notable event on October 31st?
Provide a fact about April 1st as a sentence fragment.
Give me a JSON formatted fact about May 5th.

api_list.name: Get math fact

parameters.name: fragment
parameters.description: Add "?fragment=true" to return the fact as a sentence fragment that can be easily included as part of a larger sentence. This means that the first word is lowercase and ending punctuation is omitted. For trivia and math, a noun phrase is returned that can be used in a sentence like “We now have more users than [fact as fragment]!”.

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: Specify "true" to return result as JSON instead of plaintext.

api_list.name: Get random fact

parameters.name: fragment
parameters.description: Add "?fragment=true" to return the fact as a sentence fragment that can be easily included as part of a larger sentence. This means that the first word is lowercase and ending punctuation is omitted. For trivia and math, a noun phrase is returned that can be used in a sentence like “We now have more users than [fact as fragment]!”.

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: Specify "true" to return result as JSON instead of plaintext.

utterances.utterance: Tell me a random trivia fact about numbers.
Give me a math fact about a number between 50 and 100.
What is an interesting date fact?
Share a year fact about a number between 1900 and 2000.
Can you provide a trivia fact as a sentence fragment?
Give me a math fact about a number greater than 1000.
Tell me a date fact about a number less than 31.
What is a year fact about a number between 2000 and 2020?
Provide a trivia fact in JSON format.
Give me a math fact about a number between 1 and 10 as a sentence fragment.

api_list.name: Get trivia fact
api_list.description: Get a trivia fact about a number

parameters.name: fragment
parameters.description: Add "?fragment=true" to return the fact as a sentence fragment that can be easily included as part of a larger sentence. This means that the first word is lowercase and ending punctuation is omitted. For trivia and math, a noun phrase is returned that can be used in a sentence like “We now have more users than [fact as fragment]!”.

parameters.name: notfound
parameters.description: Specifies what to return if the number is not found. Value can be "default" (to return a canned message), "floor" (to round down to the largest number that does have an associated fact, and return that fact), or "ceil" (which is like floor but rounds up to the smallest number that has an associated fact).

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: Specify "true" to return result as JSON instead of plaintext.

utterances.utterance: What is a trivia fact about the number 7?
Can you tell me an interesting fact about the number 13?
Give me a trivia fact about the number 21 as a sentence fragment.
What is a trivia fact about the number 100?
Provide a trivia fact about the number 42 in JSON format.
What is a trivia fact about the number 365? If not found, round down to the nearest number with a fact.
Tell me a trivia fact about the number 99 as a sentence fragment.
What is a trivia fact about the number 2023? If not found, round up to the nearest number with a fact.
Can you provide a trivia fact about the number 50 in JSON format?
What is a trivia fact about the number 8? If not found, return a default message.
